name: Spiders Attack: The Beginning
description:
¡Protect the universe from the Spiders' anger!

You are a soldier that must protect the universe. Inside your plain, you have a limited amount of ammo and one misile per level.

When your ammo goes to zero, ¡you lose!

Every 5 levels, there is a boss that can hurt you or not.

Will you survive? ¡Let's see!

Instructions

Press click to shot

Keep pressed to shot the misile (it shoots after 1,5 seconds, ¡so be careful!)

- Walker Devs -
